channel.title: Paying big for service
channel.description:
hello i am trying to run my first ever rsps i will be hosting it i am looking for some one who can make me a webclient for alhassa scape you know the source that is 562/659 i will offer you 20% of all profit recieved and moderator on my server just so you cant spawn shit and make your own money if you are willing to make me a forum domain to run it on i will offer you 25% porfit of all server income based money and admin so you can make your own money off of my server this is a unique offer i will honestly keep my side of the bargain if you can provide me with the above things thank you for your time reading this
please note that i will be willing to negotiate more if i feel needed to thanks again
garion

item.title: Paying big for service
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

garion2012:

bro i got it all worked out this is legit im not selling anything im looking for partner to work with me and we will make money belive me anyone interested please get in touch

Your offering money for a player’s service, if you want go to Server Development section and make a development team you’ll never get help here

Read full topic

item.title: Paying big for service
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

[quote=“garion2012, post:1, topic:447706”]hello i am trying to run my first ever rsps i will be hosting it i am looking for some one who can make me a webclient for alhassa scape you know the source that is 562/659 i will offer you 20% of all profit recieved and moderator on my server just so you cant spawn shit and make your own money if you are willing to make me a forum domain to run it on i will offer you 25% porfit of all server income based money and admin so you can make your own money off of my server this is a unique offer i will honestly keep my side of the bargain if you can provide me with the above things thank you for your time reading this

please note that i will be willing to negotiate more if i feel needed to thanks again

garion[/quote]

  1. You do realize not ruining your hope’s and dreams but there are plenty of 562/659 servers and they all end up failing.
  2. You can’t pay people to do shit for you that would be found in the rules.

Read full topic
